resources.string: Maruti Suzuki Swift, Hyundai i20, and Tata Altroz.
A hatchback is a car body configuration featuring a rear door that swings upward to provide access to a cargo area
" Honda City, Hyundai Verna, and Maruti Suzuki Ciaz"
" A sedan is a passenger car in a three-box configuration with separate compartments for engine, passenger, and cargo"
" Maruti Suzuki Ertiga, Toyota Innova Crysta, and Mahindra Marazzo"
" An MPV (Multi-Purpose Vehicle) is a car body style that combines the features of a hatchback or station wagon with those of a minivan"
Kia Seltos, Hyundai Creta, and Mahindra Thar
" An SUV (Sports Utility Vehicle) is a car body style that combines elements of road-going passenger cars with features from off-road vehicles, such as raised ground clearance and four-wheel drive"
Hyundai Venue, Kia Sonet, and Tata Nexon
" A crossover is a vehicle that combines features of a sport utility vehicle (SUV) with features from a passenger vehicle, especially those of a station wagon or hatchback."
BMW 4 Series, Audi A5, and Mercedes-Benz C-Class Coupe
" A coupe is a car with a fixed roof body style that is shorter than a sedan or saloon of the same model."
